title: Testing Lesson Save
context: Testing the saveLessonEntry API integration using the uploaded file reference.
keyIdea: Demonstrate that the saveLessonEntry endpoint is callable and functioning.
explanation: This test confirms that the API connection for lesson archiving is operational.

reusabilityNotes.whenToReuse: Whenever testing or validating the integration with the Lesson Archive Repository.
reusabilityNotes.pitfalls: Avoid using production data during connectivity tests.
